SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.javasimon.jmx
Class JmxReporter

java.lang.Object
  org.javasimon.jmx.JmxReporter

public final class JmxReporter
extends Object

Utility class for registering JMX beans that can be used to access Simon manager and Simons. JmxReporter is created by either forManager(org.javasimon.Manager) or forDefaultManager(). Additional configuration methods can be called using fluent API (). Finally start() will set up all expected MX beans and system is ready for monitoring through JMX. Method stop() unregisters all related MX beans when monitoring is no longer required.

Author:
Ivan Mushketyk, Richard "Virgo" Richter
